title: E-Commerce Dashboard
description: A high-performance admin dashboard for managing online stores with real-time analytics and inventory tracking.

title: FinTech Mobile UI
description: Modern financial application interface focusing on user experience and secure transaction visualization.

title: AI Image Generator
description: An interface leveraging DALL-E API to generate artistic visuals based on user text prompts.

title: Health & Fitness Tracker
description: A comprehensive platform for users to log workouts, track nutrition, and monitor health trends.

title: Cybersecurity Audit Tool
description: Automated security scanner that identifies vulnerabilities in web applications and provides fixes.

title: Smart Home IoT Portal
description: Unified dashboard to control and monitor connected smart home devices through a single interface.
